extendedInfo.description: Musicianâs Recorder is a revolutionary app that is perfect for on the go musicians. Musicians Recorder allows you to record any single audio input over any background music.Great to record vocals over existing background or accompany tracks using your devices built in microphone.What makes Musicians Recorder unique is its ability to accept any audio input source. With a custom cable you can now plug your keyboard, guitar, external mic, or any other audio input into your device for recording.Musicians Recorder even has a Monitor feature that allows you to monitor your input signal in real time through your headphones! Works best with a phones hands free headset with a built in mic. Awesome for recording on the go this way!Note: the Monitor feature is better suited, and has less delay with Android 4.1+

reviews.title: Horrible
reviews.comment: This doesn\'t deserve any stars! This is the WORST app I\'ve downloaded and used EVER!!! And when you listen to your voice while recording, I havs to take my earbuds out and turn off that feature because it echos after your voice and completely distracts you from your singing. DON\'T EVER INSTALL!!!
reviews.author: Hannah Stacy

reviews.title: It\'s a trap!
reviews.comment: Contains the very nasty Push Notifications that can cost people a lot of money. It\'s sits on your phone, running in the background like a spider. It gets the 2nd star because the app actually has potential.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Recorder
reviews.comment: Worst app i ever downloaded i tryied recordin my guitar and vocals and its not pickin it up dont download this app it sux
reviews.author: Kevin Brown

reviews.title: CuStom cable
reviews.comment: Where do I get this cable and what\'s it called? Can u use headphone jack as line in?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sucks king Kong balls
reviews.comment: Used to be awesome now says select track to use but my music isn\'t there
reviews.author: Michael Evans

reviews.title: Cant find my recordings
reviews.comment: Im not sure if its jus me or not bit i jus made a recording with this app and i cant find where it saved it to at all. When i clicked on the info button for the app it says it saves to my sd card but my phone has no sd card. About to un-install.
reviews.author: Tony Montana

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Once i figured out how to properly use this app it is great. The developer is great too. I had some questions and he responded within one day and cleared things up for me. I will buy the paid version soon. Thx!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pop-up ads for android
reviews.comment: Install this if you want an app that gives you obnoxious annoying pop-up ads on your home screen
reviews.author: Devon Banman

reviews.title: WARNING!!
reviews.comment: My antivirus said this contains a virus. BE WARNED!! It can take lots of money off you!
reviews.author: George Pears

reviews.title: Push notification ad\'s
reviews.comment: Push notification ads are way too much.
reviews.author: Steven Brown
